commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
def nhap():
    print('Nhap 3 so nguyen:')
    a=int(input('a='))
    b=int(input('b='))
    c=int(input('c='))
    return a,b,c
def max3(a,b,c):
    max=a
    if b>= max: max=b
    if c>= max: max=c
    kq=max
    return kq
def inkq(kq):
    print('So lon nhat la:',kq)

a,b,c=nhap()
kq=max3(a,b,c)
inkq(kq)
inkq(max(nhap()))
